snippet: On the campaign trail in 1996, Senator Bob Dole fell into a scrum of photographers - one broke the Republican candidate's fall, while the falling banister broke another one's foot. A third got the picture.
abstract: On the campaign trail in 1996, Senator Bob Dole fell into a scrum of photographers - one broke the Republican candidate's fall, while the falling banister broke another one's foot. A third got the picture.

headline.main: Catch the Shot or the Candidate?
